FlashGame.Title: South Park™
FlashGame.Description: South Park™ is a 5-reel, 3-row, 25-line video slot featuring Wild substitutions, Sticky Wilds, 4 Bonus Games and 3 mini features.

FlashGame.Title: Magic Portals
FlashGame.Description: Magic Portals™ is a 5-reel, 3-row 25-line video slot featuring two Magic Portals that can transform matching symbols into Wild substitutions and activate Free Spins.

FlashGame.Title: Reel Rush™
FlashGame.Description: Reel Rush™ is a 5-reel video slot featuring Wild substitutions, re-spins and Free Spins with up to 3125 ways to win. The game is played with 45 to 3125 ways to win, 1-10 levels (50 coins per level) and different coin values.

FlashGame.Title: Fisticuffs™
FlashGame.Description: Fisticuffs™ is a 5-reel, 3-row, 10-line video slot. The game features Win Both Ways, a Boxing Feature with a Straight Wild, a Diagonal Wild and a re-spin with Stacked Wilds.

FlashGame.Title: EggOMatic™
FlashGame.Description: EggOMatic™ is a 5-reel, 3-row, 20-line video slot featuring Wild substitutions, Free Spins and 4 different feature eggs – a Spreading Wild Egg, Free Spins Egg, Coin Win Egg and a Surprise Egg.

FlashGame.Title: Silent Run™
FlashGame.Description: Silent Run™ is a 5-reel, 3-row, 25 fixed bet line video slot. The game features a Wild symbol, an Echo Bonus symbol that activates the bonus game, and an Echo Wild symbol which searches for hidden Wild symbols.

FlashGame.Title: Space Wars™
FlashGame.Description: Space Wars™ is a 5-reel, 4-row, 40-line video slot featuring Wild substitutions, stacked symbols and a free re-spin. The game is played with 40 bet lines (fixed), 1-10 bet levels and different coin values.

FlashGame.Title: Muse: Wild Inspiration™
FlashGame.Description: Muse: Wild Inspiration™ is a 5-reel, 3-row, 25 fixed bet line video slot. The game features a Wild Inspiration symbol that randomly turns into either Expanding Wild, Sticky Wild or X2 Wild. In Free Spins the different Wild substitutions are combined offering even more chances for big wins.

FlashGame.Title: Wild Turkey™
FlashGame.Description: Wild Turkey™ is a 5-reel, 3-row, 20 bet line video slot featuring Free Spins, Wild substitutions and Stacked Wild symbols in Free Spins.

FlashGame.Title: Thief™
FlashGame.Description: Thief™ is a 5-reel, 3-row, 25-bet line video slot featuring Free Spins, Adrenaline Free Spins with a Diamond symbol and Expanding Wild substitutions.

FlashGame.Title: Elements: The Awakening™
FlashGame.Description: Elements: The Awakening™ is a 5-column, 3-row, 20-line video slot with an Avalanche™ feature and 4 different Free Fall modes each with a different Wild.

FlashGame.Title: Disco Spins™
FlashGame.Description: Disco Spins™ is a 5-reel, 3-row, 20-bet line video slot featuring 2 Free Spins Modes and a Dance Floor Wild feature.

FlashGame.Title: Lucky Angler: A Snowy Catch™
FlashGame.Description: Lucky Angler: A Snowy Catch™ is a 5-reel, 3-row, 15-bet line video slot featuring Free Spins, Win Both Ways, and Sticky Wild substitutions.

FlashGame.Title: Wild Rockets™
FlashGame.Description: Wild Rockets™ is a 720-bet way, 5-reel video slot featuring Free Spins, Wild substitutions and Win Both Ways for the chance to win more ways!

FlashGame.Title: Evolution™
FlashGame.Description: Evolution™ is a 5-reel, 3-row 25-line video slot with the reels spinning upwards on the screen. The game features Wild substitutions, Free Spins with the new Evolution feature offering even more chances for big wins.

FlashGame.Title: Beach™
FlashGame.Description: Beach™ is a 5-column, 20-line game featuring Free Waves, Wild substitutions and the Octopus wild. The game is played with 20 bet lines (fixed), 1-10 bet levels and different coin values.

FlashGame.Title: Golden Shamrock™
FlashGame.Description: Golden Shamrock™ is a 5-reel, 20-line, multiple coin video slot featuring Free spins, Scatter wins and expanding Wild substitutes. You can play 1 to 20 bet lines at 1 to 10 bet levels.

FlashGame.Title: Jack Hammer 2™
FlashGame.Description: Jack Hammer 2™ is a 99-line, 3 row video slot using 15 independent reels. The game features Sticky Wins™, Free Spins and Wild substitutions.

FlashGame.Title: Zombies
FlashGame.Description: Zombies™ is a 5-reel, 20-bet line video slot featuring Wilds, Free Spins with an increasing multiplier of up to x10 and a Random Wild Feature.

FlashGame.Title: Thunderfist
FlashGame.Description: Thunderfist™ is a 5-reel video slot featuring 243 ways to win, Stacked Wild substitutions, and Free Spins with a random multiplier of up to x5!

FlashGame.Title: Super Nudge 6000
FlashGame.Description: Super Nudge 6000™ is a 2x3-reel, 5-line, multiple coin slot featuring basic mode and supermeter mode with an automated nudge function.

FlashGame.Title: Scarface
FlashGame.Description: Scarface™ is a 5-reel, 20-line video slot featuring 3 unique Stacked Wilds, each of which activate either the Bonus Game, Nudge Spins, or Free Spins.

FlashGame.Title: Crime Scene
FlashGame.Description: Crime Scene™ is a case cracking 5-reel, 15-bet line video slot. Featuring an all new Sticky Wild with a x3 multiplier and a high tech bonus game!

FlashGame.Title: Subtopia
FlashGame.Description: Subtopia™ brings underwater adventures to new depths in this 5-reel, 20-bet line video slot. The game features Wild substitutions and a Free Spins Multiplier Meter.

FlashGame.Title: Starburst
FlashGame.Description: Starburst™ is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot featuring the Starburst™ Wild with re-spins, and win both ways. You can play 1 to 10 bet lines at different bet levels and coin values.

FlashGame.Title: Fruit Shop
FlashGame.Description: Fruit Shop™ is a highly energetic video slot with 5-reels and 15-bet lines. Classic features include Wild substitutions with a x2 multiplier and a Free Spins multiplier of x2.

FlashGame.Title: Frankenstein
FlashGame.Description: Frankenstein is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot that brings the legend of Frankenstein to life. The game features Linked WildTM substitution and Free Spins.

FlashGame.Title: Robin Hood
FlashGame.Description: Robin Hood: Shifting Riches is a 5-reel, 20-line video slot featuring Shifting Reels™ with increasing multiplier up to x5, Wild substitutions, and Free Spins that start when 4 money bags are collected in a chest.

FlashGame.Title: Demolition Squad
FlashGame.Description: Demolition Squad™ is a 5-reel, 4-row video slot featuring the Demolition Wild and Free Spins. Play 40 bet lines at different bet levels and coin values.

FlashGame.Title: Egyptian Heroes
FlashGame.Description: Egyptian Heroes is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot featuring a Golden Bet Line™ with multiplier, Wild substitutions, and Free Spins with a Sticky Expanded Wild.

FlashGame.Title: Victorious
FlashGame.Description: Victorious is a 5-reel video slot that offers 243 ways to win. In addition, the game has Free Spins and Wild substitutions.

FlashGame.Title: Simsalabim
FlashGame.Description: Simsalabim is a 5-reel, 30-line, multiple coin video slot featuring two progressive jackpots, scatter wins, Free spins, wild substitutes, and off the reel bonus game.

FlashGame.Title: Mythic Maiden
FlashGame.Description: Mythic Maiden™ is a 5-reel, 30-bet line video slot featuring Wild substitutions, Multipliers and Free Spins.

FlashGame.Title: Kings of Chicago
FlashGame.Description: Kings of Chicago combines the best elements of a video slot with classic poker . It features Poker Hands, Joker card substitutions and Free Deals.

FlashGame.Title: Jack and the Beanstalk
FlashGame.Description: Jack and the Beanstalk is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot that features Treasure Collection in Free Spins, and Walking Wilds with re-spins.

FlashGame.Title: Dragon Island
FlashGame.Description: Dragon Island is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot in which players can experience the mystical world of dragons. The game features Win Both Ways, Golden Wild substitutions and Free Spins with an Expanded Wild.

FlashGame.Title: Alien Robots
FlashGame.Description: Alien Robots is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot featuring Wild substitutions, scatter wins and Free spins with expanding Sticky wilds.

FlashGame.Title: Groovy Sixties
FlashGame.Description: Groovy Sixties™ is a retro inspired 5-reel, 4 row, 40-line video slot designed to bring the swinging sixties back with exiting features such as scatter wins and stacked wilds. Three or more animated scatter symbols will activate the free spins with a maximum win of €200,000.

FlashGame.Title: Fortune Teller
FlashGame.Description: Fortune Teller™ is an exciting 5-reel, 4 row, 30-line Romani gypsy-themed video slot. Three or more scatter symbols will activate the free spins where all the wins are multiplied X3. The maximum bet per game is €60 with a maximum win of €65,232 in free spins.

FlashGame.Title: Hot City
FlashGame.Description: A 5-reel, 25-line video slot based on a New York ritzy theme, Hot City™ offers rich graphics accompanied by themed background music. The game incorporates a VIP shoe shopping frenzy Bonus Game plus 10-30 free spins.

FlashGame.Title: Trolls
FlashGame.Description: Norse mythology is the theme of this 5-reel, 20-line video slot. Humorous trolls of all ages cast the player into the land of Faeries, where the special Golden Wild symbol will multiply their winnings by 4. Maximum bet is €80 and the maximum win is €134,700.

FlashGame.Title: Fruit Case Fruits
FlashGame.Description: The time is ripe for Fruit Case, the 5-reel, 3-line video slot where fresh fruit moves along conveyor belts until it is crushed to yield juicy winnings. The possible Free Fall wins you can get in addition to normal winnings are just like jam on toast—sweet and satisfying.

FlashGame.Title: Boom Brothers
FlashGame.Description: Join Boom Brothers for an unforgettable race for diamonds, rubies and gold in a gargantuan mine with lots and lots of explosives! Avalanches, spinning symbols and a whole raft of animated special effects makes this platinum slot game astonishing. Get ready to immerse right into the mine of Boom Brothers

FlashGame.Title: Flowers
FlashGame.Description: They may not be the prettiest flowers you ever saw in a bunch, but these flowers positively exude flower power - double flower power to be exact! With double symbols in both the main game and Free spins that literally behave the same as two individual symbols, the win chances go way beyond the usual maximum 5 symbols on a bet line. Add to that a x3 multiplier and Stacked Wilds in Free spins and players are sure to have a blooming good time with Flowers.

FlashGame.Title: Jack Hammer
FlashGame.Description: Join Jack Hammer in the gritty, glamorous underworld of the crime fighting private eye. In this video slot, each symbol spins independently giving a total of 15 spinning reels.

FlashGame.Title: Piggy Riches
FlashGame.Description: Piggy Riches is a 5-reel, 15-line multiple coin video slot that features scatter wins, Free spins and wild substitution. Players click on a scatter to select the Free spins and multiplier win of their choosing

FlashGame.Title: The Secret Code
FlashGame.Description: Deep within the gothic corridors of power, the masked statues hide their truths - are they angels or demons? You need to match the keys to the chests in the Bonus Game to find out.

FlashGame.Title: Diamond Dogs
FlashGame.Description: Players will get to rub shoulders with the VIPs of the dog world in this 5-reel, 25-line, video slot. The red carpet bonus game will have players snapping photos of their favourite celebrity dogs to win bonus coins. The maximum bet per game is €50, with a maximum win during Free spins of €65,682.

FlashGame.Title: Jungle Games
FlashGame.Description: Sports-crazed African wildlife is the theme in this 5-reel 20-line video slot. In a special pick Win feature, the player gets to choose their win type: Take the bonus coins or gamble for an even bigger win in Free spins.

FlashGame.Title: Annunaki
FlashGame.Description: Do you too, want to be one of the seven that made up the supreme assembly of An, the God of heaven? Take part in this fantastic experience wearing the clothes of the Annunaki aliens from the planet Nibiru that came down to earth to participate in the evolution of human civilization. In the bonus game, scale the tallest tower and reach the boss Enki, which will give you a hearty reward.

FlashGame.Title: Far West
FlashGame.Description: Sheriff? Or Thief? In the far frontier land, where everything is yet to be discovered and law has not arrived. Proof your courage and choose a role, who do you want to be? Wes Flagstaff the sheriff or the Gold Hunting Thief Dinamite Buck? Take on this adventure in this bonus game, show everyone that you are the fastest hand in the whole Far West by shooting the bottles, be careful not to his Barman Jack. This will reward you with a bonus.

FlashGame.Title: Wild Witches
FlashGame.Description: Wild Witches is a magical 5-reel, 20-line video slot featuring playful witches casting a spell over you. Three or more scatter symbols will activate free spins and the Witchy Wild can multiply winnings X4. The winnings in Free Spins are multiplied X3. The maximum bet per game round is €80 with a maximum win during free spins of €307,016.

FlashGame.Title: Gonzos Quest
FlashGame.Description: In Gonzo's Quest™ our hero Gonzalo Pizzaro embarks on a journey through the Amazon jungle in search for the lost city of gold - Eldorado. Replacing the traditional reel spin, the game introduces the Avalanche™. As long as there are winning bet lines, there are repeat avalanches. The maximum bet per game round is €50 with a maximum win during free spins of €112,500.

FlashGame.Title: Ghost Pirates
FlashGame.Description: A brand new type of video slot from Net Entertainment featuring a new game button panel and up to 243 bet ways instead of the traditional bet lines. The maximum win in free spins is €45,750 with a maximum bet of €62.50.

FlashGame.Title: Super Eighties
FlashGame.Description: The Super Eighties™ is a 5-reel, 4 row, 40-line video slot that will take you back to the neon lights of the 80's with exciting features such as scatter wins and stacked wilds. Three or more scatter symbols start the free spins with a maximum win of €200,000.

FlashGame.Title: Funky Seventies
FlashGame.Description: The Funky Seventies™ is a 5-reel, 4 row, 40-line video slot designed to bring the cool 70's era back with exciting features such as scatter wins and stacked wilds. Three or more scatter symbols start the free spins with a maximum win of €200,000.

FlashGame.Title: Dead Or Alive
FlashGame.Description: Dead or Alive™ is a 5-reel, 9-line western inspired video slot designed for the players looking for the real big wins with an exiting Sticky Wild feature during Free Spins. The maximum win for the whole free spins round is €886,800.

FlashGame.Title: Secrets Of Horus
FlashGame.Description: Secrets of Horus™ is a 5-reel, 20-line video slot set in ancient Egypt. Three or more scatter symbols will give you 15 Free Spins where winnings are multiplied X3. The maximum bet per game round is €40 with a maximum win during free spins of €71,676.

FlashGame.Title: Blood Suckers
FlashGame.Description: Blood Suckers™ is a thrilling 5-reel, 25-line vampire inspired video slot with outstanding graphics, atmospheric background sounds and a chilling bonus game. The maximum bet per game is €50 with a maximum win during free spins of €50,730.

FlashGame.Title: Relic Raiders
FlashGame.Description: This dynamic 5 reel, 50 bet-line video slot is sure to attract the thrill seeking competitor in you. Relic Raiders™ comprises a number of exciting features including an adventurous bonus game, a mystery win and freespins with up to 5 times the win.

FlashGame.Title: Mega Joker
FlashGame.Description: The Mega Joker offers fast slot action with a progressive mystery jackpot and a supermeter bonus game with winnings of up to 2,000 coins.

FlashGame.Title: Geisha Wonders
FlashGame.Description: Geisha Wonders is a fast and straight forward Japanese themed video slot with 5 reels and 30 bet-lines. This slot shares the same progressive jackpot with our other two Wonders video slots.

FlashGame.Title: Devil's Delight
FlashGame.Description: A witty and colourful devilish themed 20-line, 5-reel video slot together with an interactive bonus game and extra free spins with winnings reaching €100,000.

FlashGame.Title: Reel Steal
FlashGame.Description: Gangster inspired 5-reel, 9-line video slot. The wild symbol has a 5x multiplier on all wins and an additional 5x multiplier in free spins with a maximum single win in free spins of €187,500.

FlashGame.Title: Excalibur
FlashGame.Description: Get swept away to medieval times and mysteries in this 5 reel, 20 bet line video slot. Hit the Golden Wild symbol and multiply your winnings four times for large wins. With the wins tripled in free spins you can win up to 120,000 coins in one spin!

FlashGame.Title: Viking's Treasure
FlashGame.Description: Look for the Vikings Treasure, this video slot features animated gold as the Scatter symbol and a Viking as the Wild symbol. Three or more Scatter symbols will give you 15 Free Spins with tripled winnings of up to 112,500 coins.

FlashGame.Title: Beetle Frenzy
FlashGame.Description: This classic 9 reel, 5 line slot is loaded with cool features and bonus games. Win up to €25,000!

FlashGame.Title: Nefertari
FlashGame.Description: This beautiful queen, 'was the wife of Ramses II and it' was one of the most 'loved by the Egyptian people. Let her bewitch you and help her find the treasure hidden inside the pyramid, but be very careful to move only the right bricks, otherwise you will be bitten by a dangerous snakes.

FlashGame.Title: Pandora's Box
FlashGame.Description: Pandora's Box™ is an exhilarating 5-reel, 20-line video slot set in antique Greece. The Golden Wild will multiply winnings X4. Three or more scatter symbols will give you 10 Free Spins where winnings are multiplied X3. The maximum bet per game round is €80 with a maximum win during free spins of €134,700.

FlashGame.Title: Thrill Spin
FlashGame.Description: Thrill Spin™ is a 5-reel, 15-line amusement park-themed video slot featuring free spins which multiply your winnings X3 and Wild substitutions which are multiplied X2. This game is sure to thrill the most devoted video slot player with its maximum bet of €37.50 and maximum win of €90,165.

FlashGame.Title: Champion of the Track
FlashGame.Description: Champion of the Track™ is a 5-reel, 30-line horseracing inspired video slot. Packed with interwoven features Champion of the Track™ includes wild substitutes, free spins and an intricate horse racing bonus game with jockey career steps with a maximum win of up to €48,532.

FlashGame.Title: Tales of Krakow
FlashGame.Description: This fairy tale video slot is filled with animated dragons, elves and princes on horseback. When 3 or more dragons appear the interactive Bonus game begins. Win up to €36,000 on a single spin with Tales of Krakow.

FlashGame.Title: Mystery at the Mansion
FlashGame.Description: Mystery at the Mansion is a 25 bet line video slot and up to 30 Free Spins. This game gives you the chance to solve a murder in clue do-style in the bonus feature round.

FlashGame.Title: Fishy Fortune
FlashGame.Description: Get fortunate with Fishy Fortune, 10 line video slot, animated treasure wild symbol and a mermaid scatter symbol. Win with multiple combinations, up to 30 free spins with tripled winnings.

FlashGame.Title: Arabian Nights
FlashGame.Description: Arabian Nights has triple winnings on Free Spins increasing chances of large winnings. The wild symbol doubles the winnings and if five wild symbols turn up on any one bet line player wins the progressive pooled jackpot.

FlashGame.Title: Spellcast
FlashGame.Description: The Wizard symbol is Wild and multiplier. Spellcast is a 5-reel, 20-line multiple coin video slot featuring Wild, Scatter and Free Bonus Spins with a Max Bet €40.

FlashGame.Title: Pacific Attack
FlashGame.Description: Pacific Attack is inspired by the great pacific battles of World War II and features a bonus game based on the classic game Battleship pre-dating World War II. The game features up to 30 free Bonus Spins with tripled winnings.

FlashGame.Title: Voodoo Vibes
FlashGame.Description: Voodoo Vibes is inspired by the voodoo culture, featuring wild and scatter symbols, free spins and an interactive bonus game with animations. The game also features 10 Free Spins and Wins triple on Free Spins.

FlashGame.Title: Pirate's Gold
FlashGame.Description: Discover the Pirate's Gold in this 5-reel slot. The Bonus game gives you winnings of 10, 50 or 100 times your bet on the bonus bet line. Sink an enemy ship using a cannon, hit the ship with the golden and proceed to the second bonus game to add more winnings.

FlashGame.Title: Gold Rush
FlashGame.Description: Go for the Gold Rush, this 3 reel one-line slot has a progressive jackpot win. The maximum bet of €0.60 and 3 Gold Rush symbols on one line will win you the jackpot.

FlashGame.Title: Crusade of Fortune
FlashGame.Description: A video slot featuring mystical animations, Crusade of Fortune takes you into a fantasy world. The bonus round has two different bonus games; up to 30 free spins with tripled winnings and an action filled battle bonus.

FlashGame.Title: Super Lucky Frog
FlashGame.Description: The Super Lucky Frog is based on the fairy folklore with a modern manga twist. This highly animated 5-reel, 25 line multiple coin video slot features wild and scatter symbols, free spins and a triple Jackpot game.

FlashGame.Title: Jackpot 6000
FlashGame.Description: This classic looking 3 reel 5 line slot machine features jokers a heads or tales double up as well as a supermeter mode. Jackpot 6000 allows a win up of to 6,000 coins per game.

FlashGame.Title: Lucky 8-Line
FlashGame.Description: The Lucky 8 Line is an easy to play 9 reel slot. Wins are possible on any one of 3 horizontal lines, 3 vertical lines and/or both diagonal lines.

FlashGame.Title: Magic Love
FlashGame.Description: The spirit of love will lead your luck to a jackpot win in Magic Love. This colourful 3 reel slot has a maximum bet of 64 coins. During a spin the wheels may be stopped, either all wheels at the same time or each vertical line individually.

FlashGame.Title: Safari Madness
FlashGame.Description: With a Safari theme, Safari Madness is a simple 9-reel 8 line slot game, with a maximum payout of 3,000 coins. During a spin the wheels may be stopped, either all wheels at the same time or each vertical line individually.

FlashGame.Title: Icy Wonders
FlashGame.Description: Icy Wonders is video slot featuring two progressive jackpots that are linked to Tiki Wonders. It features a bonus game where the player gets to pick penguins and a 10, 20 or 30 free spin bonus with a 2x multiplier on winnings.

FlashGame.Title: Tiki Wonders
FlashGame.Description: This 30-line slot takes the player into the fantasy of surfing and swimming on a tropical island. Tiki Wonders variety of exotic animals, mouth watering cocktails and a volcanic backdrop to the beach sets the mood. The game features a 10, 20 or 30 free spin bonus with a 3x multiplier on winnings.
